org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client

Class BindingViewImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
        • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
          • org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client.BindingViewImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasAttachHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasVisibility, IsRenderable, IsWidget, Binder, BindingValidationHandler, BindingView, HasBindingHandler, HasBindingValues, WidgetBinder

    public abstract class BindingViewImpl
extends Composite
implements BindingView
    BindingView default implementation. It is simply a Composite supporting databind.

    You may extend it to build your views.

    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

      • unbind

        public boolean unbind(String id)
        Description copied from interface: Binder
        Releases any binding previously made with the given id.
        Specified by:
        unbind in interface Binder
        Parameters:

        Returns:
